title: 1-2 Switch's Troubled Sequel, Summer Announcements Heat Up! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.08.22
description:
Blessing, Janet, and a surprise Imran Khan talk about Fanbyte's report of a 1-2 Switch sequel that's in turmoil, big review round ups, and Resident Evil 4 making another upcoming appearance.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping

There’s a new episode of the Kinda Funny Gamescast up right now and it’s our Quarry review! Me, Greg, Joey and Mike have all played it and all have stuff to say about it, and we’ll have more later because we’re releasing a very special Spoilercast for The Quarry when it comes out this Friday.

Also on Youtube.com/Kindafunnygames: PS I Love You XOXO is up and it’s a special Stray preview. Me and Greg have both seen it and spill all the beans. We also talk about Bend Studio’s future and whether or not Insomniac is gonna make another Ratchet and Clank.

Remember!: The Blessing Show is back for a special episode about the Steam Deck! It’s up right now Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames


Lastly, we’re at the very beginning of Summer Games Fest season. Summer Games Fest Live, Xbox Games Showcase, and more are happening in the coming weeks. Make sure to check-in to Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames because we’ll be reacting to it all live along with you.

The Roper Report  -

00:07:57 - Required Reading: 1-2 Switch’s sequel is in development hell - https://bit.ly/3xuR390
00:23:13 - Fire Emblem Warriors Three Hopes Preview Round up
00:33:43 - Ads
00:35:32 - Mario Strikers: Battle League Review Round up
00:47:13 - We’re gonna see more Resident Evil 4 NEXT WEEK
00:49:25 - We’re gonna see Midnight Suns tomorrow!
00:53:25 - Bend Studio confirms they’re working on a new IP!
01:03:33 - Saudi Arabia has acquired a $1 Billion stake in Embracer Group
01:05:45 - Out today
01:07:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
